weekly picks (Feb 1 week 2023)

Posted on January 30, 2023 in 2023feb,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2023 Feb 1st week collection

  1. PhysRevX.13.011010 Bipolaronic High-Temperature Superconductivity (strong el-ph, PRX)

  2. PhysRevB.107.014310 Monte Carlo simulation of the nuclear spin decoherence process in ${\mathrm{Eu}}^{3+}$:${\mathrm{Y}}{2}{\mathrm{SiO}}{5}$ crystals (PRB)

  3. PhysRevB.107.014424 Coexistence of random singlets and disordered Kitaev spin liquid in ${\mathrm{H}}{3}{\mathrm{LiIr}}{2}{\mathrm{O}}_{6}$ (PRB)

  4. PhysRevB.107.014512 Detrimental effects of disorder in two-dimensional time-reversal invariant topological superconductors (PRB)

  5. PhysRevB.107.024424 Nonreciprocal magnetoacoustic waves in synthetic antiferromagnets with Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction (PRB)

  6. PhysRevB.107.035151 Gross-Neveu-Heisenberg criticality from $2+\ensuremath{\epsilon}$ expansion (TMeng, PRB)

  7. PhysRevB.107.035438 Dimension-dependent magnetic anisotropy for tunable anomalous Hall effect in transition metal dichalcogenides (PRB)

  8. PhysRevB.107.045142 Observation of spin-polarized surface states in the nodal-line semimetal ${\mathrm{SnTaS}}_{2}$ (PRB)

  9. PhysRevB.107.045145 Tetragonal SnOFeSe: A possible parent compound of the FeSe-based superconductor (FeSe, PRB)

  10. PhysRevB.107.045146 Delocalization of topological surface states by diagonal disorder in nodal loop semimetals (PRB)

  11. PhysRevB.107.045430 Effect of uniaxial strain on the excitonic properties of monolayer ${\mathrm{C}}_{3}\mathrm{N}$: A symmetry-based analysis (strain, PRB)

  12. PhysRevB.107.L041113 Phonon softening and slowing-down of charge density wave fluctuations in ${\mathrm{BaNi}}{2}{\mathrm{As}}{2}$ (PRB)

  13. 2301.11348 Topological Nodal Point Superconductivity in Checkerboard Magnet-Superconductor Hybrid Systems (arXiv)

  14. 2301.11425 Anomalously high supercurrent density in a two-dimensional topological material (arXiv)

  15. 2301.11458 Superconductivity of anomalous pseudospin (arXiv)

  16. 2301.11523 Externally-triggerable optical pump-probe scanning tunneling microscopy with a time resolution of tens-picosecond (arXiv)

  17. 2301.11652 Two-dimensional superconductors with intrinsic p-wave pairing or nontrivial band topology (TSC, arXiv)

  18. 2301.11708 Classical Monte Carlo algorithm for simulation of a pseudospin model for cuprates (MC, arXiv)

  19. 2301.11840 Features of the Domain Boundaries of a Highly Anisotropic (S = 1) Antiferromagnet near the Transition to the Quantum Paramagnet Phase (arXiv)

  20. 2301.11853 Competition between the Spin and Pseudospin Subsystems in a Model Cuprate (arXiv)

  21. 2301.11876 Influence of Local Correlations on the "Homogeneo (arXiv)

  22. 2301.11337 New critical states induced by measurement (arXiv)

  23. 2301.11392 Noise and Thermal Depinning of Wigner Crystals (arXiv)

  24. 2301.11395 Cubic Double Perovskites Host Noncoplanar Spin Textures (arXiv)

  25. 2301.11404 A Quantum Monte Carlo study of the structural, energetic, and magnetic properties of two-dimensional (2D) H and T phase VSe$_2$ (arXiv)

  26. 2301.11506 Ginzburg-Landau action and polarization current in an excitonic insulator model of electronic ferroelectricity (arXiv)

  27. 2301.11537 Behavior under magnetic field of resonance at the edge of the upper Hubbard band in 1T-TaS2 (arXiv)

  28. 2301.11917 Everything is a quantum Ising model (arXiv)
